name: Avizant Yellow
description: Avizant Yellow  contains the yellow coloring xanthophyll lutein, which is obtained from the petals of the marigold flower. The flower extract is gently hydrolyzed using a process patented by Kaesler, which ensures optimal bioavailability of the oxycarotenoids. The  Avizant  product range for the pigmentation of egg yolk and poultry skin is characterized by a consistently high xanthopyll content, optimal bioavailability and stability.
